entries.title: Help URL
entries.description: URL to the manual. If empty, it links to the latest manual from BEXIS2

entries.title: Check public metadata for not-logged in users
entries.description: If set to true, the metadata of non-public datasets will also be visible to non-logged-in users, in addition to the metadata of public datasets.

entries.title: Reduce versions select for logged in users
entries.description: If set to true, logged-in users will only see major and minor versions of a dataset instead of all versions.

entries.title: Restrict to latest version for logged in users
entries.description: If set to true, logged-in users will only see the newest version of a dataset instead of all versions.

entries.title: Activate tags to summarize versions
entries.description: If set to true, using tags is enabled to define a combination of versions.

entries.title: Use minor tags
entries.description: If set to true, the minor version tag can be assigned to dataset versions to display changes in more detail.

entries.title: Data Aggreement by download
entries.description: Set up  if user need to aggree the data aggreements before download and where the aggreement is writen.

entries.title: Configuration Settings for Curation
entries.description:
Customize the labels that can be used in the curation. 
Example: "curationLabels": [ { "name": "custom-label-1", "color": "#ff0000" }, ... ]
